Long drop hanging is swift and humane, death is caused by the instantaneous fracture of the C2 or C3 cervical vertebrae. An afterlife or reincarnation would be preferable.

There are categories of drug offender on death row: 
1) Drug mules.
2) Drug addicts who have to resort to drug sales and trafficking to feed their habits, as they are unable to have a stable job or income.
3) Non-addicts who become drug dealers and pushers out of their own will or greed.
4) Drug lords, drug syndicate leaders, drug kingpins and ring leaders

3 and 4 are the most unforgivable and culpable, their execution would be justice. As for 1 and 2, their executions are tragic as all of them are low income, poor and came from dismal backgrounds

When people turn to drugs it shows that there are pertinent social & family / personal problems that needs to be solved. Some turn to drugs because : (1) Due to bad company and vices that entice them through peer pressure (2) Due to broken family and not able to seek help & counseling (3) Unable to deal / manage and cope with stress arising from studies or work and unnoticed by teachers and parents (4) lack of family love & spiritual peace with oneself.  Hope such drug addicts should seek help from loved ones and professional rehabilitation centers. As for drug traffickers, they are aware of the consequences and should be dealt with by the law. That said, there drug addicts who are forced into trafficking by the drug dealers. Such cases are very sad indeed.
